name: Verify link for list of KRAs and KPIs

testSteps.description: Given Verify beta-mis is open and loaded successfully.

children.description: Step to login into the website

testSteps.description: When User logins into application with username "arpit.mishra" and password "Gemini@123"
Then Verify beta-mis Dashboard page opens

children.description: Verify that dashboard is present and logo is present

testSteps.description: Then Click on "Add Goals" Sub Tab inside "Appraisal Management" tab.
And Verify that "Add My Goal/Team Goal" text is present on the current page.

children.description: Verify Add My Goal/Team Goal text is present in current page

testSteps.description: Then Click on "List of KRAs and KPIs link" button

children.description: Click on List of KRAs and KPIs link button
